          <title>
            <string language="es">La clonación de humanos</string>
            <string language="en">Human cloning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschliches Klonen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Clonage humain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cloning humano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Clonazione umana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρώπινη κλωνοποίηση</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno tiene que descubrir si es posible y si es deseable la clonación humana.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student has to discover if human cloning is possible and if it is desirable.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">clonación</string>
            <string language="en">cloning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reino Animal</string>
            <string language="en">Animal kingdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer entdecken 
muß, wenn menschliches Klonen möglich ist und wenn es wünschenswert
ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
découvrir si le clonage humain est possible et s'il est souhaitable.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A pesquisa em que o estudante tem que descobrir 
se o cloning humano for possível e se é desejável.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve scoprire se la 
clonazione umana è possibile e se è desiderabile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να ανακαλύψει
εάν η ανθρώπινη κλωνοποίηση είναι δυνατή και εάν αυτό είναι 
επιθυμητή.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
